si.title: මහනුවර දිස්ත්රික්කය කුණ්ඩසාලෙයි මැතිවරණ මැතිවරණ මැතිවරණයේ ප්රති result ලය:

en.title: Kandy District Kundasalai Election constituency Voting Result:

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the Kandy District Kundasalai Election constituency Voting Result in approximately 200 characters:

"Kandy District Kundasalai Election Results: [Candidate A] 15,000 votes (40%), [Candidate B] 12,000 votes (30%), [Candidate C] 10,000 votes (25%). Turnout: 80%. Incumbent re-elected with narrow margin."
